title: Reduce size of client js bundles

body: These changes removes over 1mb of javascript from being bundled for the client. Most of this comes from the chunk-vendors file, which is shrunk by 500kb to be less than 1mb now.
lint errors to straighten out, looks like

also there's a fatal error during build, which I think comes from this branch:
```
[20:15:32] /tmp/build_e64483e8/node_modules/validator/es/lib/isUUID.js:1
       import assertString from './util/assertString';
       ^^^^^^
       
       SyntaxError: Cannot use import statement outside a module
```
